synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The material adopts a pillared Hofmann-type topology with rectangular channels along the [100] direction accounting for 49% of the total crystal volume. The channels are occupied by disordered, non-coordinated dpsme ligands, p-stacking between the pyridyl units of the coordinated pillars, and disordered guest ethanol and water molecules.

materials.name: Thermal and photo-induced spin crossover behavior

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The material exhibits a three-step SCO transition upon both cooling and warming with broad thermal hysteresis. Accompanying this transition is a series of subtle structural modulations.
